about_the_game:
"Machine Love 2069" is an adult-only clicker game set in a fascinating cyberpunk universe. It's a game that combines the simplicity of clicking with an intense, immersive narrative.



You play as "SynthEcho", a character making his way through the cyber city, one click at a time. Every click draws you closer to thrilling encounters with intriguing AI characters, unveiling a world where technology and human desires intertwine.



Indulge in a life of neon-lit decadence, forming connections with androids and experiencing captivating storylines. All it takes is a simple click to dive into the narrative and uncover the secrets of this futuristic city.



With one-handed gameplay, you navigate through this thrilling cyberpunk world using just your mouse. Simple, easy, yet highly engaging.

"Machine Love 2069" offers a unique blend of adult content and cyberpunk themes, all in an easy-to-play clicker game format. Come explore a future where every click counts!

Features:


  • Immersive Cyberpunk World: Dive into the heart of a neon-lit, rain-drenched cityscape, buzzing with advanced technology and an intriguing AI populace.
  • Engaging Clicker Mechanics: Simple yet addictive gameplay mechanic - each click progresses your narrative and takes you deeper into the intricate world of Machine Love 2069.
  • Adult-Only Content: Experience mature and provocative storylines filled with intrigue, romance, and deception.
  • Interactive AI Characters: Form relationships with an array of fascinating androids, each with unique personalities, backgrounds, and storylines to uncover.
  • One-Handed Gameplay: Navigate through the game using simple, intuitive mouse controls, designed for easy and comfortable gameplay.
  • Branching Narratives: Your decisions shape the narrative, leading to a multitude of different story arcs and outcomes.
  • High-Quality Graphics: Immerse yourself in stunning, detailed visuals that beautifully depict the cyberpunk city and its denizens.
  • Riveting Sound Design: Lose yourself in the atmospheric soundscapes that perfectly capture the vibe of the futuristic metropolis.
  • Progressive Character Development: Enhance your influence in the city and your relationships with AI characters as the game progresses.
  • Intricate World Building: Discover the lore of the city, its inhabitants, and the broader cyberpunk world as you dive deeper into the game, creating a richly layered and immersive gaming experience.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content not appropriate for all ages, or for viewing at work: sexual content, nudity. 
The game graphically depicts sex.
 All characters in the game are over the age of 18.

name: Machine Love 2069

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: "Machine Love 2069" is an adult-only clicker game set in a fascinating cyberpunk universe. It's a game that combines the simplicity of clicking with an intense, immersive sexual experience.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Norwegian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Romanian, Thai, Turkish, Hungarian, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
